attributes.action: Aid the victims of the Bahraini Al Dana Dhow Tragedy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister and the British Government to push for a swift resolution for the victims and their families of the Al Dana Dhow Tragedy in regards to compensation. It has been over 2 years since the disaster which ripped apart the lives of so many people, with no end to the suffering in sight we urge Mr Brown to step up and help the British families who are struggling to feed their families.
